item.title: The Making of an Analyst: A Supplement to What Makes a Good Business Analyst
item.description: I once commented the entry, What Makes a Good Business Analyst by Rajan Chandras, with an easy tone, If You Can Make it Here, You Can Make it Anywhere. The standards of a good analyst conclude by Rajan, in my opinion, are somewhat of very high bars. <div> <span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span> </div> <div> <span style="font-family: Arial;">In the recent SASCOM Magazine, Ted Cuzzillo published a relatively moderate enty, say, <em><a href="http://www.
